A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no idea how many of these critics got paid off\, but this movie doesn't deserve an A rating. It's not a bad film\, but it's certainly underwhelming for what it's suppose to be; that's a brand new Star Wars film. It falters at almost every chance the movie gives itself. You think something great is about to happen at several key moments\, but it falls flat every single time. This film tried way too hard to confuse the audience\, instead of just giving them what they wanted. I can't really recommend this\, and I'm a life-long fan. Where Rogue One succeeded\, The Last Jedi failed.
